sentences: Founded in 1984, the band dissolved in 1990 and re-activated in 2002. Vendetta's contemporaries include bands such as Exumer and Paradox.
Vendetta's bassist Klaus "Heiner" Ullrich is currently the only original member present since the band's formation in 1984.
